title: Sins of the Father
description: David Blaze is a widowed father living in New York City, who works as a scientist by day, and a martial arts master by night. One day he receives a project request directly from the Department of Defense which leads him to believe a major war is coming. When his suspicions come true, an evil from David's past comes out of hiding during Earth's most critical hour, forcing him to make a choice: run and save his only son, or stay and confront his worst fear--His sins.
author: Glenn Rosado
